xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 19 February 2014
xwikidoc.content: <v101> has joined #phenotips 03:53 <mcupak> has quit 08:28 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 10:24 <sdumitriu1> has quit 10:41 <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:28 <akats> Right now the paternal ethnicity suggest box works by requesting the default XWiki Suggest Widget suggest.vm template. That template gives results out by looking through existing XWiki objects. But we need to search through Solr. The quick search box does that by having a Xwiki page that uses a Java service. Do you want me to implement a Java service with an Xwiki page for the ethnicity suggest box? 11:44 <sdumitriu> akats: Yes 15:23 <akats> Do we use an xml module 15:23 <sdumitriu> ? 15:24 <akats> does xwiki have anything that could parse xml from velocity? 15:24 <akats> that we already have enabled 15:24 <sdumitriu> Yes, let me find it 15:25 <sdumitriu> https://www.google.com/search?q=xwiki+srd 15:26 <akats> Thank you 15:26 <sdumitriu> $services.xml -> http://maven.xwiki.org/site/docs/xwiki-javadoc-4.1.x/org/xwiki/xml/internal/XMLScriptService.html 18:28 <Guest34010> has joined #phenotips 18:29 <Guest34010> has quit 18:29 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 18:32 <marta__> akats: sdumitriu: in the ethnicities index, is each ethnicity boosted proportionally to its known nb of representatives, or are they all equal? 18:32 <sdumitriu> They should be 18:33 <marta__> ok that's good 18:33 <sdumitriu> akats: Can you confirm? 18:34 <sdumitriu> It's supposed to be: doc boost = log10 of lower population limit 18:34 <sdumitriu> Not sure if that's enough or not, we'll see 18:35 <marta__> okay 18:36 <sdumitriu> 1 if no population info available 18:36 <marta__> we may need to "hardcode" some very common ones with higher boosts 19:02 <akats> has quit 22:04 <marta__1> has joined #phenotips 22:05 <marta__> has quit 22:08 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 22:09 <marta__1> has quit 22:22 <marta__1> has joined #phenotips 22:25 <marta__> has quit 22:37 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 22:39 <marta__1> has quit 23:29 <kushalk124> has quit
